dictionary.s_prompt_importGameQuestion: Do you wish to load game save file?: [Y/N]
dictionary.s_prompt_printSaveFiles:
Please input a number, according to following available save files:
%s
dictionary.s_prompt_changeLanguageQuestion: Do you wish to change language from default language (English)?: [Y/N]
dictionary.s_prompt_printLanguages: Please input a number, according to following available languages: %s
dictionary.s_prompt_changePlayerNameQuestion: Do you wish to set custom player names?: [Y/N]
dictionary.s_prompt_changePlayerNameSuccess: Successfully changed player names. The game will now commence!
dictionary.game_turn: %s's Turn! press enter to roll dice
dictionary.dicerollresult: You rolled %d & %d, for a total of: %d
dictionary.square_2: You have made your way to a Tower, and found %d money!
dictionary.square_3: You walked into a Crater, and dropped %d money!
dictionary.square_4: You stand in front of the Palace gates, and got %d money!
dictionary.square_5: You walk through a Cold desert, and lose %d money on the way!
dictionary.square_6: You stand in front on the Walled city, and a drunk gatekeeper drops %d money!
dictionary.square_7: You make your way through the Monastery, your money remains unchanged!
dictionary.square_8: You explore the dark Black cave, and pay the entrance fee of %d money!
dictionary.square_9: You spend a night at the Huts in the mountain, a demented grandpa left %d money under the pillow!
dictionary.square_10: You stand at The Werewall, you make a deal with a werewolf, and pay %d money for a new turn!
dictionary.square_11: You twist your ankle in The pit, and pay %d money for a crutch!
dictionary.square_12: You got lucky in the Goldmine, and sell your gold to the shopkeeper for %d money!
